tool_description: BSearch Web search API allows you to get the search results from the entire web based on the keyword and/or the region as optional. It also includes autocomplete (also known as autosuggest) functionality for more than 50 languages.
name: BSearch
title: BSearch

api_list.name: Get web search results
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back web search results based on the provided query and/or language (i.e. us-en, uk-en, tr-tr, pl-pl, es-es etc.).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bsearch2.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bsearch2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bsearch2.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bsearch2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
